PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.subtitle: Your privacy is our priority. Learn how we handle your data.

sections.title: 1. Data Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our AI speaking coach, or contact support. This may include your email, name, and audio recordings (if you opt-in for storage).

sections.title: 2. How We Use Data
sections.content: We use the collected data to provide, maintain, and improve our services, including the AI coaching engine. Audio data is processed in real-time to provide feedback and is only stored if you explicitly grant permission.

sections.title: 3. Data Security
sections.content: We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data both in transit and at rest. Your information is stored securely on our servers and is never sold to third parties.

items.a: talkflo is an AI-powered English speaking coach designed to help you improve fluency through real-time role-play and instant feedback.

items.q: How does it compare to a real tutor?
items.a: While it doesn't replace human connection, talkflo provides 24/7 availability, instant feedback, and a safe, judgment-free zone to practice as much as you want.
